articles.title: English study suggests T cells could be sufficient to protect from COVID-19 - Reuters
articles.description: High levels of so-called "T cells" that respond to the coronavirus could be sufficient to offer protection against infection, an English study said on Tuesday, adding to the evidence of the crucial role they play in immunity to COVID-19.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
